@Entity("demo")
@Label("message.entities.demo")
@Createable
@Editable
@Deleteable
@Access(Access.PUBLIC)
@FormType(update=FormType.TABBED)
@Categories({"message.categories.common", "message.categories.example"})
class Demo {

  @Field("demoChild")
  @Label("message.fields.demo.demo-child")
  @Editable
  @Searchable
  @ShowInResults
  @ShowInDetails
  @ShowInUpdate
  @SearchConf(policy=Validator.EXACT_MATCH, multiplicity=Multiplicity.MANY, fields={"key"})
  @ApiName("codeDemoChild")
  private String demoField;

  // Fields and methods
  ...
}
